column2: "Anadwe no ɔhen no ne nda fii no do
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa mbermunsɛm nkaanwoma no mbra
column4: na wɔkenkaan no wɔ ɔhen no enyim."

column2: "Na wohun dɛ wɔakyerɛw dɛ Modekai na ɔbɛkaa Bigitana na Teres
column3: ɔhen n'epiafo beenu no a wofi hɔn a wɔhwɛ abowano no mu no a wɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ wonyi ɔhen Ahasuerus no nkwa fi hɔ no ho asɛm."
Ebɛn enyidzi na kɛseyɛ na wɔdze ayɛ Modekai wɔ iyi ho? Nna ɔhen no nkowaa a wɔsom no no see dɛ
Woana na ɔwɔ abangua no do? Afei nna Haman aba ɔhen ne fi no ekyir abangua no do
column4: dɛ ɔrebɛka akyerɛ ɔhen ma wɔaasɛn Modekai wɔ dua no a oesi ama no no do."

column2: "Na ɔhen no nkowaa no see no dɛ
column4: Haman gyina abangua no do. Na ɔhen no see dɛ

column2: "Nna Haman baa dan mu. Na ɔhen no bisaa no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na wɔmfa nyɛ nyimpa a ɔhen pɛ dɛ odzi no nyi no? Afei Haman see wɔ n'akoma mu dɛ
column4: Woana mpo na ɔhen pɛ dɛ odzi no nyi sen mara?"

column3: Nyimpa a ɔhen pɛ dɛ odzi no nyi no
column5: "ma wɔmfa ahentar a ɔhen tɔ dɛ ɔhyɛ no mbra
column6: na ɔpɔnkɔ a ɔhen tɔ dɛ ɔtsena do no a wɔdze ahendzi abɔtsir abɔ ne tsir no
column8: "na ma wɔmfa atar na ɔpɔnkɔ no nhyɛ ɔhen ne mbapɔmba ekunyin no mu baako ne nsa
column9: ma wɔmfa nhyɛ nyimpa a ɔhen pɛ dɛ odzi no nyi no
column10: na wɔmma ɔntsena ɔpɔnkɔ no do mfa kurow no n'abɔntsen do
column12: Mbrɛ wɔdze bɛyɛ nyimpa a ɔhen pɛ dɛ odzi no nyi no

column3: Ka woho kɛfa atar na ɔpɔnkɔ no
column5: na yɛ dɛmara ma Jewnyi Modekai no a ɔtse ɔhen no kuropon mu no: mma nngyaa dza aka no nyinara mu biara."

column2: "Nna Haman faa atar no na ɔpɔnkɔ no
column4: na ɔmaa ɔtsenaa ɔpɔnkɔ do dze faa kurow no n'abɔntsen do
column6: Mbrɛ wɔdze bɛyɛ nyia ɔhen pɛ dɛ odzi no nyi no nye yi oo."

column2: "Na Modekai sanee baa ɔhen no kuropon no mu bio. Na Haman dze
column3: ɔyɛɛ ntsɛm dze nkɔmbɔdzi na ne tsir do a wɔakata

column2: "Na Haman kaa dza aba no do no nyinara kyerɛɛ ne yer Zeres na ne mfɛfo no nyinara. Nna n'enyansafo no na ne yer Zeres see no dɛ
column3: Sɛ Modekai a ɔwo ahyɛ ase rohwe famu wɔ n'enyim yi
column5: ɔno irunntum nndzi no do nyim
column6: mbom ase ara na ebɔhwe wɔ n'enyim."

column2: "Aber a wɔnye no da do rekasa no
column4: na wɔpɛɛ ntsɛm dɛ wɔdze Haman bɔkɔ pon no a Ester ato no ho."
